Description: At the Capitol Theatre in Moncton, several drag queens and a drag king put on a timely production they wrote together called Jennifer Russell and COVID 19 A Press Conference Drag Show
Title: Drag performers revel in return of live audiences
Author: CBC News

Description: A Moncton resident was left concerned after she called 911 and was redirected to three dispatchers in Nova Scotia, and never put in touch with someone to provide assistance in the province the incident occurred
Title: New Brunswickers concerned after 911 calls directed to N S
Author: Isabelle Leger

Description: The largest homeless shelter in Moncton appointed new board members after the New Brunswick government warned its funding could be at risk if it didn t act on recommendations of an audit that found management and financial problems
Title: Moncton largest homeless shelter appoints new board after audit finds problems
Author: Shane Magee

Description: Residents of Moncton are being encouraged to try something different during the month of June Camp Centennial is opening up its climbing wall to the public for Parks and Recreation month
Title: Moncton residents encouraged to scale new heights for the month of June
Author: Kate Letterick

Description: Two men charged with first degree murder in connection with the disappearance of Jamie Leard appeared in Moncton provincial court Wednesday afternoon and requested adjournments to secure legal representation
Title: Two charged with murdering Jamie Leard will apply for legal aid
Author: Shane Magee
